meanings.definition: In a way that relates to cleanliness and health.
meanings.sent1: She washed her hands hygienically before preparing the food.
meanings.sent2: The dentist always ensures to clean his tools hygienically.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to groom itself hygienically but ended up with soap bubbles all over.
meanings.sent4: The hospital staff worked hygienically, ensuring every surface sparkled with cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant proudly displayed a sign stating they operated hygienically at all times.

meanings.definition: In a manner that promotes good health and cleanliness.
meanings.sent1: The gym encourages members to wipe down equipment hygienically after use.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared the meal hygienically, following all safety protocols.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaner moved around the house hygienically, ensuring no dust was left behind.
meanings.sent4: The garden was tended to hygienically, with each plant receiving the perfect amount of water and sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The students were taught to always handle food hygienically to prevent any contamination.
